::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer takes a step back, smiling triumphantly. He did it! Or at least he 
thought he did it... Now he just needed to wait. If all went well, there'd be 
a new Alliance member soon.

DevilDuer watches the pod, waiting for it to get done with its buisness.
